    [Information]

    These Artificial Silk Boxwood Foliage Wall Panels are intricately handcrafted with brilliant finishing, small and detailed green leaves impart a dense and naturally opaque look, perfect for where complete concealment is required. Create magical backdrops, photo backgrounds, wall coverings, fence accents, build hedges, lush passage way or paths, or even vertical gardens with our life-like faux foliage panels. These realistic looking decorative green panels feature lifelike boxwood leaves on sturdy plastic netting that is bendable, can be trimmed, and can easily be attached to most structures.

    Connect two or more ageless green screens for longer presentations, or cut it with a pair of scissors into creative shapes and dimensions. For a truly mesmerizing look, adorn these panels with our Giant Foam Flowers, Ivy Garlands, Silk Petals, Hydrangea Wall Panels, and other dream-like accessories.

Additional Information:

  • QTY: 1 Table Runner/Order
  • Material: Plastic/PVC

  • Width: 1ft
  • Eco-friendly and Long Lasting
  • Natural looking and easy to clean
  • Multipurpose: Our table runner is ideal for rustic table themes, nature-themed arrangements,  mini gardens, and as table highlight and accent.
